snippet.title: Sea of Craft Developer Diary 2: Single Player I
snippet.description:
Informational video series showcasing the latest exciting gameplay and features in Sea of Craft.

Sea of Craft is a realistic physics-based construction and adventure game that puts you at the helm of your maritime masterworks.

The latest Sea of Craft Demo will be available to play during Steam Next Fest starting 16th June. Set a reminder here:

https://store.steampowered.com/news/group/39049601/view/3034836460557502332

For more information about Sea of Craft:

Sea of Craft Steam Store Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/99...
Sea of Craft Discord: https://discord.gg/b7DyYVq
Sea of Craft Twitter: https://twitter.com/SeaOfCraft
